ygData.subject: RE: Thermal cloak idea
ygData.msgSnippet: I have also Read that the same way. It states that the Fire water was on the Belt & hooked to the cloak in some way that it heated the cloak. Good Luck on your
ygData.messageBody:
I have also Read that the same way. It states that the Fire water was on the
Belt & hooked to the cloak in some way that it heated the cloak. Good Luck
on your attempt at this.

-----Original Message-----
From: shemei@... [mailto:shemei@...]
Sent: Wednesday, September 22, 1999 7:17 AM
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] Thermal cloak idea

From: shemei@...

I had this idea while re-reading the instuctions as to make a Thermal Cloak.
Maybe we need to combine a few objects (Like FireWater and Belt) to create a
new
object (maybe "fuel belt" or something) to be used in the final construction
(I.E. fuel belt, rods and tattered cloak)- The way it's phrased in the tome
insinuates that. I'll try it tonight.

Safe Journeys

Nalasren
